3.message:
v1.0.7

Gameplay:
    Moved the resource chicken variants into their own category
    Changed resource chicken icons in the book to be the resource, not the chicken
    Changed the Water Egg font color to a lighter shade of blue more in line with the Lava Egg
3.author: kii-chan-reloaded

5.message: Make the lava/water egg items show the respective chicken in the recipe
5.author: kii-chan-reloaded

6.message:
v1.0.9 - fix #6

Gameplay:
    Fix null pointer exception when Pocket Chicken has no DNA metadata (cheating in base PC item)
    All resource recipes now use base PC item, meaning clicking on it will route to that recipe
    Fix unreported bug where disabling custom names meant a PC would not restore the chicken's state
Backend:
    Use better color codes and text formatting for items
    Make variant generation for the book a little less confusing
6.author: kii-chan-reloaded

7.message:
v1.0.10 - Freeze for v1.1.0 (See #7)

This will be the last full point release for v1.0. Bug fixes will be released for v1.0.10 until v1.1.0 on Feb 5, 2021

Gameplay:
    Added visual warning to Excitation Chamber regarding game-breaking changes when upgrading to v1.1.0
    Added server log warning about automatic updates being disabled after Feb 5, 2021 00:00 UTC
Backend:
    Set value for plugin reference on all machines (variable was defined, but not set)
    Override Excitation Chamber's constructMenu method, preps for v1.1
7.author: kii-chan-reloaded

9.message:
Close #8

Gameplay:
    Add two new config options to optionally increase difficulty
9.author: kii-chan-reloaded

10.message:
v1.1.1

Gameplay:
    Added gce command
    Added MakeChicken subcommand
    Added CalculateChance subcommand
    Added config options for toggling commands and permissions
Backend:
    Fixed progress bar slot being set to air on new Excitation Chambers
    Create command framework
    Added methods to expose private variables in genetics, other convenience methods
10.author: kii-chan-reloaded

12.message:
v1.2.0, the inhumane update

Gameplay:
    Added optional settings to enable causing the chickens pain
        The pain rate can be adjusted
        Enables the Restoration Chamber
        Enables new lore "Status"; chickens can be healthy, fatigued, or exhausted
        Running out of health can either kill the chickens in the machines or stop the machine from working.
Backend:
    Reworked clamp function, added support for clamping doubles
    Added a smattering of functions for convenience
12.author: kii-chan-reloaded

13.message:
v1.2.1 - fix #12

Gameplay:
    Add a check to see if Water Eggs are being used in the Nether
    Add config variable to toggle if Water Eggs work in the Nether, default false
Backend:
    Change Resource Egg function to use interfaces for fluid placement
13.author: kii-chan-reloaded
